welcome.title: Welcome to Ottehr
welcome.subtitle: Online Scheduling
welcome.support: We are here to support you and your family.
welcome.availability: Please, enter your mobile phone number. We'll verify if we have your information already. If we do, we'll pre-fill your past information for a faster booking.

file.title: File type not supported
file.description: Please select a .jpg, .png, or .jpeg file types.

bookingConfirmation.descriptionBodyOne: Please click on Continue to proceed to a page where you will enter your phone number. We'll verify if we have your information already. If we do, we will pre-fill your past information for a faster booking.
bookingConfirmation.descriptionBodyTwo: Please note that your family's information may be registered under a phone number owned by your partner, spouse, or child's guardian.
